author: wsjcom
title: Should Companies Let Employees Use Social Media at Work?
text:
Social-media use has become the norm in the U.S., with around 7-in-10 Americans now using platforms like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram to connect with others, share news and information or be entertained, according to the Pew Research Center.
For many people, itâ€™s a part of daily life: Roughly three-quarters of Facebook users and 60% of Instagram users visit these sites at least once a day, Pew data show.
